text: Springerville is a town of Apache County in the state of Arizona in the United States. As of the 2020 census, 1,717 people lived there. == References == == Other websites == * Town of Springerville official website * Round Valley History * Springerville News * "Springerville, Arizona", at City-Data.com * Springerville & Eagar Scenic Attractions * Madonna of the Trail | August Leimbach website Category:Towns in Arizona
title: Springerville, Arizona
